name: Dungeons of Deepweeper
description:
can you survive the dungeons of deepweeper?

try out this super hard traditional roguelike! be sure to look at all your stats and items before planning out your next move, these dungeons are unforgiving! controls are in the bottom right of the screen. hover over things with the mouse for more info on enemies and items on the ground.

still unsure if i will continue to work on this project unless i find an interesting thing that would make this game more unique!

good luck! let me know if you have any feeback or thoughts!

(using urizen tileset by vurmux)
